Title: Establishes the New York state public health care option program; and establishes the New York state public health care option program fund
Summary: Establishes the New York state public health care option program to provide a comprehensive and affordable health care insurance option for all residents of this state; establishes the New York state public health care option program fund.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 3-A §§245 - 245-d, Pub Health L; add §99-pp, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the New York state public health care option program; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York state public health care option program fund
